name: Zombie Free Throw
description:
BASKETBALL. WITH. ZOMBIES.

Swipe to throw your zombie head into the hoop to score points.

Collect shiny green zombie skulls to unlock new characters. Every 100 skulls you collect gets you a free character to play with.

There are 3 different game modes to play, compete for the highest score in Endless, get the most baskets in a limited time in Rapid Fire mode, or play Level Up and progress through the levels to increase the challenge.
